45 class ControllerDescription : public PhysicsBase {
46 public:
47  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
50 
51  enum ControllerType {
52  kBox,
53  kCapsule
54  };
55 
56  static std::shared_ptr<ControllerDescription> create(const QJsonValue& json);
57 
59 
60  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
63 
64  ControllerDescription(ControllerType type);
65  virtual ~ControllerDescription();
66 
68 
69  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
72 
73  virtual std::shared_ptr<physx::PxControllerDesc> toPhysX() const = 0;
74 
76 
77  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
80 
82  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
83 
85  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
86 
88 
89  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
92 
94  const char* className() const override { return "ControllerDescription"; }
95 
97  const char* namespaceName() const override { return "rev::ControllerDescription"; }
98 
100 
101 
102  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
105 
106  Vector3 m_initialPosition = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}; // The position of the character
107  Vector3 m_upDirection = {0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f}; // Specifies the 'up' direction
108  float m_slopeLimit= 0.707f; // The maximum slope which the character can walk up (in radians)
109  float m_invisibleWallHeight = 0.0f; // Height of invisible walls created around non-walkable triangles, e.g. those defined by slope limit
110 
113  float m_maxJumpHeight = 0.0f; // Maximum height a jumping character can reach. Only used if invisible walls are created
114  float m_contactOffset = 0.1f; // The contact offset used by the controller, used to avoid numerical precision issues. Specifies a skin around the object within which contacts will be generated
115  float m_stepOffset = 0.5f; // Defines the maximum height of an obstacle which the character can climb
116  float m_density = 10.0f; // Density of the underlying kinematic actor
117  float m_scaleCoeff = 0.99f; // Uniform scaling for the kinematic actor under the hood, should be a bit smaller than one
118  float m_volumeGrowth = 1.5f; // The amount of space around the controller that can be cached to improve performance, ideally between 1.0f and 2.0f
119 
121  // This report callback is called when the character collides with shapes and other characters.
122  // Setting this to NULL disables the callback.
123  physx::PxUserControllerHitReport* m_reportCallback = nullptr;
124 
126  // This behavior callback is called to customize the controller's behavior w.r.t. touched shapes.
127  // Setting this to NULL disables the callback.
128  physx::PxControllerBehaviorCallback* m_behaviorCallback = nullptr;
129 
131  // If a character controller registers a deletion listener, it will get informed about released
132  // objects. That allows the controller to invalidate cached data that connects to a released object.
133  // If a deletion listener is not registered,
134  // PxController::invalidateCache has to be called manually after objects have been released.
135  bool m_registerDeletionListener = true;
136 
139  std::shared_ptr<PhysicsMaterial> m_material = nullptr;
140 
142  int m_unwalkableMode = 0;
143 
145  void* m_userData = nullptr;
146 
147  ControllerType m_type;
148 
150 
151 protected:
152 
154  void loadIntoPhysx(std::shared_ptr<physx::PxControllerDesc> pxDesc) const;
155 };

291 class CharacterController : public PhysicsBase {
292 public:
293  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
296 
297  enum ControllerType {
298  kBox = physx::PxControllerShapeType::eBOX,
299  kCapsule = physx::PxControllerShapeType::eCAPSULE
300  };
301 
302  enum CollisionType
303  {
304  kCollisionSides = (1 << 0),
305  kCollisionUp = (1 << 1),
306  kCollisionDown = (1 << 2)
307  };
308 
309  enum UnwalkableMode {
310  kPreventClimbing = (1 << 0),
311  kForceSliding = (1 << 1)
312  };
313  typedef QFlags<UnwalkableMode> WalkableFlags;
314 
316 
317  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
320  virtual ~CharacterController();
322 
323  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
326 
327  float heightOffset() const {
328  return m_heightOffset;
329  }
330  void setHeightOffset(float offset) { m_heightOffset = offset; }
331 
333  const Vector3& getGravity() const { return m_gravity; }
334  void setGravity(const Vector3& g) {
335  m_gravity = g;
336  }
337 
338  const Vector3& getFallVelocity() const { return m_fallVelocity; }
339  void setFallVelocity(const Vector3& v) { m_fallVelocity = v; }
340 
341  float getTerminalVelocity() const { return m_terminalVelocity; }
342 
344  bool isGrounded() const { return m_isGrounded; }
345 
347 
348  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
351 
353  ControllerType getType() const {
354  return ControllerType(m_controller->getType());
355  }
356 
359  // TODO: Implement obstacles
360  QFlags<CharacterController::CollisionType> move(const Vector3& displacement);
361  QFlags<CharacterController::CollisionType> move(const Vector3d& displacement);
362  QFlags<CharacterController::CollisionType> move(const Vector3d& displacement,
363  const ControllerFilters& filters, const physx::PxObstacleContext* obstacles = nullptr);
364 
366  Vector3 getPosition() const {
367  const physx::PxExtendedVec3& pos = m_controller->getPosition();
368  return Vector3(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
369  }
370 
372  bool setPosition(const Vector3& pos) {
373  return m_controller->setPosition({ pos.x(), pos.y(), pos.z() });
374  }
375 
377  const Vector3& getInitialPosition() const {
378  return m_description->m_initialPosition;
379  }
380  bool setInitialPosition(const Vector3& pos) {
381  m_description->m_initialPosition = pos;
382  return m_controller->setPosition({ pos.x(), pos.y(), pos.z() });
383  }
384 
385  void updateFallVelocity(float dt);
386 
389  Vector3d getFootPosition() const {
390  const physx::PxExtendedVec3& footPos = m_controller->getFootPosition();
391  return Vector3d(footPos.x, footPos.y, footPos.z);
392  }
393 
394  bool setFootPosition(const Vector3d& footPos) {
395  return m_controller->setFootPosition({ footPos.x(), footPos.y(), footPos.z() });
396  }
397 
399  // TODO: Use userData attribute of actor to identify as a character controller
400  physx::PxRigidDynamic* getActor() const {
401  return m_controller->getActor();
402  }
403 
405  physx::PxScene* getPxScene() const {
406  return m_controller->getScene();
407  }
408 
410  float getStepOffset() const { return m_controller->getStepOffset(); }
411  void setStepOffset(float offset) { m_controller->setStepOffset(offset); }
412 
415  void setUnwalkableMode(const WalkableFlags& flags) {
416  if (flags.testFlag(kForceSliding))
417  m_controller->setNonWalkableMode(physx::PxControllerNonWalkableMode::ePREVENT_CLIMBING_AND_FORCE_SLIDING);
418  else
419  m_controller->setNonWalkableMode(physx::PxControllerNonWalkableMode::ePREVENT_CLIMBING);
420  }
421 
422  WalkableFlags getUnwalkableMode() const {
423  WalkableFlags flags;
424  size_t mode = (size_t)m_controller->getNonWalkableMode();
425  flags.setFlag(kPreventClimbing, true);
426  if (mode) {
427  flags.setFlag(kForceSliding, true);
428  }
429  return flags;
430  }
431 
433  float getContactOffset() const {
434  return m_controller->getContactOffset();
435  }
436  void setContactOffset(float offset) { m_controller->setContactOffset(offset); }
437 
440  Vector3 getUpDirection() const {
441  physx::PxVec3 vec = m_controller->getUpDirection();
442  return Vector3(vec.x, vec.y, vec.z);
443  }
444  void setUpDirection(const Vector3& vec) {
445  m_controller->setUpDirection({ vec.x(), vec.y(), vec.z() });
446  }
447 
450  float getSlopeLimit() const { return m_controller->getSlopeLimit(); }
451 
453  void resize(float height) { m_controller->resize(height); }
454 
456 
457  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
460 
462  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
463 
465  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
466 
468 
469  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
473  const char* className() const override { return "CharacterController"; }
474 
476  const char* namespaceName() const override { return "rev::CharacterController"; }
477 
479 
480 protected:
481  friend class CCTManager;
482  friend class PhysicsManager;
483 
484  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
487 
488  CharacterController(std::shared_ptr<ControllerDescription> desc,
489  const std::shared_ptr<SceneObject>& sceneObject);
490 
492  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
495 
496  CoreEngine* getEngine() const;
497  const std::shared_ptr<CCTManager>& getManager() const;
498 
500  inline std::shared_ptr<SceneObject> sceneObject() const {
501  if (std::shared_ptr<SceneObject> so = m_sceneObject.lock()) {
502  return so;
503  }
504  else {
505  return nullptr;
506  }
507  }
508 
509  void initialize();
510 
512 
513  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
516 
518  float m_lastTimeInSecs = 0;
519 
521  float m_minDistance = 1e-6f;
522 
524  std::weak_ptr<SceneObject> m_sceneObject;
525 
526  physx::PxController* m_controller;
527 
529  std::shared_ptr<ControllerDescription> m_description;
530 
531  bool m_isGrounded = false;
532 
534  float m_heightOffset = 0.0f;
535 
537  Vector3 m_gravity = { 0.0f, -9.81f, 0.0f };
538  Vector3 m_fallVelocity = { 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f };
539 
541  float m_terminalVelocity = 55.0f; // m/s
542 
544

617 
618 
623 /*
624 A capsule character controller.
625 
626 The capsule is defined as a position, a vertical height, and a radius. The height is the distance between the two sphere centers at the end of the capsule. In other words:
627 
628 p = pos (returned by controller)
629 h = height
630 r = radius
631 
632 p = center of capsule
633 top sphere center = p.y + h*0.5
634 bottom sphere center = p.y - h*0.5
635 top capsule point = p.y + h*0.5 + r
636 bottom capsule point = p.y - h*0.5 - r
637 */
638 class CapsuleController : public CharacterController {
639 public:
640  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
643 
644  enum ClimbingMode {
645  kEasy,
646  kConstrained
647  };
648 
650 
651  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
655 
656  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
659 
660  float getRadius() const { return controller()->getRadius(); }
661  bool setRadius(float radius) {
662  description()->m_radius = radius;
663  return controller()->setRadius(radius);
664  }
665 
667  float getHeight() const { return controller()->getHeight(); }
668  bool setHeight(float height) {
669  description()->m_height = height;
670  return controller()->setHeight(height);
671  }
672 
673  ClimbingMode getClimbingMode() const {
674  return ClimbingMode(controller()->getClimbingMode());
675  }
676  bool setClimbingMode(ClimbingMode mode) {
677  controller()->setClimbingMode(physx::PxCapsuleClimbingMode::Enum(mode));
678  }
679 
681 
682 protected:
683  friend class CCTManager;
684 
685 
686  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
689 
690  CapsuleController(std::shared_ptr<CapsuleControllerDescription> desc,
691  const std::shared_ptr<SceneObject>& sceneObject);
692 
694 
695  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
698 
699  std::shared_ptr<CapsuleControllerDescription> description() const {
700  return std::static_pointer_cast<CapsuleControllerDescription>(m_description);
701  }
702 
703  physx::PxCapsuleController* controller() const {
704  return static_cast<physx::PxCapsuleController*>(m_controller);
705  }
706 
708 };
